This is one of the few places in Barcelona we loved!  Carpe Diem Lounge & Club is not a nightclub as categorized here, but it's a pretty cool restaurant and swanky cocktail lounge with giant beds you can relax on.  The entrance above ground resembles a blink-and-you'll-miss-it kiosk.  The underground lair, however, is spacious and well decorated.  I had the non-alcoholic cocktail - some fruit smoothie - and it was delicious!  Perfectly refreshing and sweet after a humid summer night on the beach.
